quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: You’ve gotta dance like there’s nobody watching, love like you’ll never be hurt, sing like there’s nobody listening, and live like it’s heaven on earth.
quotes.author: William W. Purkey

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Smart people learn from everything and everyone, average people from their experiences, stupid people already have all the answers.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.quote: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
quotes.author: Ancient Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway
